snippet: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel on Wednesday unveiled details of a plan to save at least $1 billion in personnel costs over five years.
abstract: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel unveils details of a plan to save at least $1 billion in personnel costs over five years through a 20 percent reduction in the number of Pentagon staff members who report to him.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel on Wednesday unveiled details of a plan to save at least $1 billion in personnel costs over five years.

headline.main: Hagel Details 20% Cut in Personnel Who Report to Him
headline.print_headline: Plan to Cut Personnel at Pentagon

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
